description:
Violet accepts an unusual request from a very demanding opera singer: Ilma wants her to write a love letter she can use for lyrics in an aria.
Source: netflix

titles.title: "Kitto "Ai" o Shiru Hi ga Kuru no Darou"
"The Day You Understand "I Love You" Will Surely Come."
Bez wątpienia pewnego dnia zrozumiesz znaczenie słów „Kocham cię”
「きっと"愛"を知る日が来るのだろう」
